text: June 26 - - The first - ever NBA Awards aired live on TNT from Basketball City in New York featuring the traditional season - ending awards plus six new categories, all determined exclusively by fan voting. Below is a complete list of winners : Kia NBA Most Valuable Player | Voting Totals Russell Westbrook won the 2017 Kia NBA Most Valuable Player Award. Kia NBA Defensive Player of the Year | Voting Totals Draymond Green's versatility helps win him the Kia NBA Defensive Player of the Year Award. Kia Most Improved Player | Voting Totals Giannis Antetokounmpo's breakout season earns him the Kia Most Improved Player Award. Kia NBA Sixth Man Award | Voting Totals Eric Gordon takes home the 2016 - 17 Kia NBA
